Ịzụ ahịa mmadụ (Mgbochi, Nlekọta na Ndozigharị) Iwu, 2021 ma ọ bụ TIP Bill ga-enye iwu zuru oke na nke raara onwe ya nye megide ịzụ ahịa na India.]

A na-emeso ịzụ ahịa na India n'okpuru ọtụtụ iwu dịka Indian Penal Code nke afọ 1860, Immoral Traffic (Prevention) Act, nke afọ 1986, Bonded Labour Regulation Act, nke afọ 1986 na Child Labour Regulation Act, nke afọ 1986. Iwu nke afọ 2021 bu n'obi inye iwu raara onwe ya nye
Ụdị mbụ nke iwu a tụrụ aro gụnyere Trafficking of Persons (Prevention, Protection and Rehabilitation) Bill 2016 na Trafficking of Persons (Prevention, Protection and Rehabilitation) Bill, 2018
E depụtara iwu nke afọ 2018 na Lok Sabha ma gafee na n'ọnwa wee Julaị nke afọ 2018
Otú ọ dị, iwu ahụ emetụbeghị ya na Rajya Sabha mgbe ọha na eze na-akwadoghị
Mgbe emechara oge mbụ nke gọọmentị Narendra Modi n'afọ 2019, ụgwọ ahụ kwụsịrị.

A gbara Iwu ahụ ajụjụ maka na ọ naghị ekpuchi ụdị ọ bụla nke ịzụ ahịa mmadụ, maka na ọ naghị ekpuchi ahịa n'ụzọ doro anya ịzụ ahịa na-agafe ókèala, na maka ịghara ịkọwa n'ụzọ doro anya otú iwu ahụ kwesịrị isi mekọrịta iwu ndị ọzọ dị ka Nchedo nke Ụmụaka site na Mmekọahụ
Ọrụ nke nkwenye na ma onye a na-azụ ahịa chọrọ ka a napụta ya ma gbanwee ya adịghị ekpuchi nke ọma.

A katọrọ iwu nke afọ 2018 ọzọ maka emeghị ihe ọ zubere ime, nke ịbụ "nke doro anya na nke zuru oke". A katọrọ ya maka i kekwaị anya na onye omekome ma hapụ ilekwasa anya na onye emegidere zuru oke. E welitere akụkụ nke otú iwu ahụ ga-esi daba n'usoro iwu dị ugbu a ọzọ.
Iwu nke afọ 2021 na-eme ka National Investigation Agency bụrụ ụlọ ọrụ na-enyocha ihe ndị dị otú ahụ
Otú ọ dị, e mere ka ọ pụta ìhè na ụgwọ ahụ akọwaghị usoro nnapụta.
